package corejava;

public class square extends rectangle {

	public square(String color, double width, double height) {
		super(color, width, height);
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}
	void draw()
	{
	setHeight(height);
	setWidth(width);
	setColor(color);
	double area=getHeight()*getWidth();
	System.out.println("square filled with "+getColor()+" and area = "+area);
	
	}

}
